hints.text: 🥛 I give you milk.
🌱 I eat grass.
⚫ I have black and white spots.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🐟 I love to eat fish.
😴 I like to sleep a lot.

animal.question: I say 'Quack!' and I swim in the water. What am I?

hints.text: 🐥 I am small and yellow when I am a baby.
🌾 I eat seeds and plants.
🌊 I like to play in puddles.

animal.question: I wag my tail and bark. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like to chew on bones.
🚶‍♀️ I like to go for walks.
🏡 I protect your house.

animal.question: I hop around and eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I have long ears.
🐾 I have a fluffy tail.
🐇 I can be white, brown or black.

animal.question: I am big and grey, and I have a long trunk. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am the biggest land animal.
🚿 I use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I roar very loud and I'm the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane.
🐾 I am a cat, but a very big one!
👑 All the other animals respect me!

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and run very fast. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I look a bit like a horse.
🌱 I eat grass.
🌍 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I swing from trees and eat bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I have a long tail.
🌴 I live in the jungle.
🗣️ I make a lot of noise!

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am very tall.
🌍 I live in Africa.
🌿 I eat leaves from the tallest trees.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, and you need an umbrella. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am wet.
🌧️ I come from the clouds.
☔ You don't want to go outside without an umbrella when I am here

weather.question: I am big and bright, and I keep you warm. What am I?

hints.text: 🔆 I am yellow.
😎 I shine during the day.
🔥 Plants need me to grow.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy, and I float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like cotton.
🌬️ I can block the sun.
🌧️ Sometimes rain comes from me.

weather.question: Sometimes I am hot, sometimes I am cold. What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ You can measure me with a thermometer.
☀️ The sun makes me hot.
🥶 You need a coat when I am cold.

weather.question: I make the leaves dance in the trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can be gentle or strong.
💨 You can't see me, but you can feel me.
🪁 I can help your kite fly high.

weather.question: I am colorful and appear after the rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
☀️ I need the sun and the rain to appear.
✨ I am shaped like an arc.

weather.question: I am cold and white, and fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am very small.
⛄ You can build a snowman with me.
🧤 You need gloves when I fall.

weather.question: I am loud and scary, and come with lightning. What am I?

hints.text: ⛈️ I come during a storm.
⚡ I follow the flash.
🙉 You cover your ears when you hear me.

weather.question: I am white and frosty, and cover the grass in the morning. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am cold and wet.
🧊 I look like tiny ice crystals.
☀️ I disappear when the sun comes out.

weather.question: I am made of tiny drops of water close to the ground, and I make it hard to see. What am I?

hints.text: 🌫️ I'm like a cloud on the ground
🚗 Drivers must be very careful when I'm around
👻 I can make things look a little mysterious.
